fixes.name: Net Flow
fixes.solution_explanation: Replaced SUM([Deposit amount]) and SUM([Withdrawal Amount]) (which are conditional row-level calcs) with CALCULATE(SUM('accounts+'[Amount]), 'accounts+'[TransactionType] = "Deposit") and CALCULATE(SUM('accounts+'[Amount]), 'accounts+'[TransactionType] = "Withdrawal") to reproduce the Tableau SUM(IF ... THEN ... END) behavior.
